title: Data Concerns Drag Down U.S.-Listed Chinese Brokers
sub_head: Shares in Futu and Up Fintech fall sharply, after Chinese state media says new privacy laws would pose challenges to them
body:
Shares in Futu Holdings Ltd. and Up Fintech Holding Ltd. fell sharply, after Chinese state media said the countryâ€™s tough new data-privacy laws would pose challenges for the brokerage firms.
The two online brokers, which are listed on the Nasdaq Stock Market, said they placed a priority on legal compliance and protecting customer information.
